text:
Hi

When I transfer a big file (500 mb) it sometimes happens, that the receiving side (suse 11) stops all network activity. 
As a result, I have to restart the whole server.
This happens with different versions of jsch including the newest one and 0.1.4.2

But: it never happened with the old ant version (1.6 something I guess, together with an jsch 1.29)

The transferrate seems pretty high as well, I do ~20 mb/s 

When using pscp I am at around 8 mb/s (but at least pscp works)

Thank you
creator: bello@gmx.net
jkf@apache.org
text:
Several bugs have been filed on Suse 11 involving large / fast file transfers to crash the machine.
Unless you have data which indicates that ant somehow sends some incorrect data that directly causes a crash on suse 11 please open a ticket at suse 11.
In this case please provide information for fault analysis.
